articles.author: Kara Carlson
articles.title: Bezos-Backed Startup Launches Cheap, US-Made Electric Pickup - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A Jeff Bezos-backed startup aims to appeal to American car buyers’ patriotism and pocketbooks.
articles.content:
A Jeff Bezos-backed startup aims to appeal to American car buyers patriotism and pocketbooks. 
Slate Auto plans to debut a small electric-powered, American-made pickup for less than $20,000 with fed… [+235 chars]
